description: Lychees are a delicacy that can be enjoyed both fresh and in desserts. They're known to have an aphrodisiac effect, so why not enjoy them at their best with this special liqueur?The Red Lotus brings out the lychee flavors perfectly, while it enhances&nbsp;vodka making it easy for anyone who enjoys&nbsp;mixed drinks.
